00020 
00021 list<string> tokenise (const string& line) {
00022         
00023         //construct a string stream.
00024         stringstream lineStream (line);
00025         
00026         //strip out white space and stop if 
00027         //we get a comment.
00028         list<string> tokens;
00029         string token;
00030         while(lineStream >> token) {
00031                 if(string::npos != token.find("#", 0)) break;
00032                 tokens.push_back (token);
00033         }
00034         
00035         return tokens;
00036 }
00037 
00038 void processData (SparseMatrix& m,  istream& matrixData)
00039 {
00040         string line;
00041         
00042         for(unsigned int i = 0; i < m.size1(); i++) {
00043                 getline(matrixData, line);
00044                 if(i == 0 && line == "uniform") {
00045                         for(i = 0; i < m.size1(); i++) {
00046                                 for(unsigned int j = 0; j < m.size2(); j++) {
00047                                         m(i,j) = 1.0  / m.size2();
00048                                 }
00049                         }
00050                         return;                 
00051                 }
00052                 else if(i == 0 && line =="identity") {
00053                         //I take min of size1() and size2() _incase_ someone has
00054                         //put identity for a matrix that does not want to be square.
00055                         for(i = 0; i < min(m.size1(),m.size2()); i++) {
00056                                 m(i,i) = 1.0;
00057                         }
00058                         return;
00059                 }
00060                 else {
00061                         list<string> rowData = tokenise (line);
00062                         list<string>::iterator it = rowData.begin ();
00063                         for(unsigned int j = 0; j < m.size2(); j++) {
00064                                 m(i,j) = atof ((*it++).c_str());
00065                         }
00066                 }
00067         }
00068 }
00069 
00070 void processData (SparseMatrix& m, int b, list<string>::iterator s, 
00071         list<string>::iterator e) {
00072         if(b == -1) {
00073                 for(unsigned int i = 0; i < m.size1(); i++) {
00074                         processData (m, i, s, e);
00075                 }
00076         } 
00077         else {
00078                 int columnIndex = 0;
00079                 while(s != e) {
00080                         m (b, columnIndex++) = atof((*s++).c_str());;
00081                 }
00082         }
00083 }
00084 
00085 void processData (SparseMatrix& m, int b,  istream& matrixData) {
00086         string line;
00087         while(getline(matrixData,line)) {
00088                 list<string> tokens = tokenise (line);
00089                 if(tokens.size()) {
00090                         processData (m, b,  tokens.begin(), tokens.end());
00091                         return;
00092                 }
00093         }
00094 }
00095 
00096 void processData (SparseMatrix& m,  int b,  int c, string value) {
00097         if(b == -1) {
00098                 for(unsigned int i = 0; i < m.size1(); i++) {
00099                         processData (m, i, c, value);
00100                 }
00101         }
00102         else if (c == -1) {
00103                 for(unsigned int i = 0; i < m.size2(); i++) {
00104                         processData (m, b, i, value);
00105                 }
00106         }
00107         else
00108                 m (b,c) = atof (value.c_str());
00109 }
00110 
00111 void processData (SparseMatrix& m,  int b,  int c, istream& matrixData) {
00112         string line;
00113         while(getline(matrixData,line)) {
00114                 list<string> tokens = tokenise (line);
00115                 if(tokens.size()) {
00116                         processData (m, b, c, tokens.front());
00117                         return;
00118                 }
00119         }
00120 }
00121 
00122 int toIndex (map<string, int> map, string potentialIndex) {
00123 
00124         if(potentialIndex == "*") return -1;
00125         int i = atoi (potentialIndex.c_str());
00126         if(i) return i;
00127         return map [potentialIndex];
00128 }
00129 
00130 Cassandra* readCassandra (ifstream& file) {
00131 
00132         //Headers
00133         float discount = 0.0F;
00134         bool rewardValue;
00135         
00136         
00137         //Either there will be entries in the map,
00138         //or the corresponding numXXX value will be set.
00139         map<string, int> states;
00140         map<string, int> observations;
00141         map<string, int> actions;
00142         
00143         int numStates = 0;
00144         int numObservations = 0;
00145         int numActions = 0;
00146         
00147         //Data
00148         map<int, SparseMatrix*> actionTransitions;
00149         map<int, SparseMatrix*> actionObservations;
00150         map<int, map<int, SparseMatrix*> > rewards;
00151         
00152         string line;
00153         int lineNumber = 1;
00154         
00155         //Read through each line in the stream.
00156         while (getline (file, line)) {
00157         
00158                 //Find the number of colons, used to for parsing
00159                 //object definition lines.
00160                 int numColons = 0;
00161                 unsigned int i = line.find(":",0);
00162                 
00163                 while(i != string::npos) {
00164                         numColons ++;
00165                         i = line.find(":", i+1);
00166                 }
00167                 
00168                 //Replace each : with a space, causing colons to become
00169                 //tokens.
00170                 for(int i = 0; i < numColons; i++) {
00171                         int index = line.find(":", 0);
00172                         line.replace (index, 1, " ");
00173                 }
00174                 
00175                 //Tokenise line (this stops when it finds a token with a # in it).
00176                 list<string> tokens = tokenise (line);
00177                 
00178                 //if we have some tokesn in this line.
00179                 if(tokens.size()) {
00180                 
00181                         //retrieve the handle, the first token, used to determine
00182                         //how to parse the line.
00183                         string handle = tokens.front ();
00184                         
00185                         //The discount for the simulator, this is a floating point number.
00186                         if("discount" == handle) {
00187                                 discount = atof (tokens.back ().c_str());
00188                                 if(discount == 0.0) {
00189                                         cout << "Error [" << lineNumber << 
00190                                         " invalid floating point: "
00191                                                 << tokens.back () << endl;
00192                                         return NULL;
00193                                 }
00194                         }
00195                         
00196                         //Value, currently ignored in the simulator.
00197                         if("values" == handle) {
00198                                 if(tokens.back() == "reward") {
00199                                         rewardValue = true;
00200                                 }
00201                                 else if(tokens.back () == "cost") {
00202                                         rewardValue = false;
00203                                 }
00204                                 else {
00205                                         cout << "Error [" << lineNumber <<"] unknown value: "
00206                                                 << tokens.back () << endl;
00207                                                 
00208                                         return NULL;
00209                                 }
00210                         }
00211                         
00212                         //Either a list of state names or an integer listing the
00213                         //number of states.
00214                         if("states" == handle) {
00215                                 list<string>::iterator it = tokens.begin ();
00216                                 it++;
00217                                 
00218                                 numStates = atoi ((*it).c_str());
00219                                 
00220                                 if(0 == numStates) {
00221                                         int i = 0;
00222                                         while(it != tokens.end()) {
00223                                                 states [(*it++)] = i++;
00224                                         }
00225                                         numStates = states.size();
00226                                 }
00227                         }
00228                         
00229                         //Either a list of action names or an integer
00230                         //stating the number of actions.
00231                         if("actions" == handle) {
00232                                 list<string>::iterator it = tokens.begin ();
00233                                 it++;
00234                                 
00235                                 numActions = atoi ((*it).c_str());
00236                                 if(0 == numActions) {
00237                                         int i = 0;
00238                                         while(it != tokens.end())  {
00239                                                 actions [(*it++)] = i++;
00240                                         }
00241                                         numActions = actions.size ();
00242                                 }
00243                         }
00244                         
00245                         //Either a list of action names or an integer stating
00246                         //the number of actions.
00247                         
00248                         
00249                         if("observations" == handle) {
00250                                 list<string>::iterator it = tokens.begin ();
00251                                 it++;
00252                                 
00253                                 numObservations = atoi ((*it).c_str());
00254                                 if(0 == numObservations) {
00255                                         int i = 0;
00256                                         while(it != tokens.end())  {
00257                                                 observations [(*it++)] = i++;
00258                                         }
00259                                         numObservations = observations.size();
00260                                 }
00261                         }
00262                         
00263                         //Process a line, and potentially additional lines of data,
00264                         //defining an observation.
00265                         if("O" == handle) {
00266                                 
00267                                 //Are we operating over all actions.
00268                                 bool wildAction = false;
00269                                                                 
00270                                 //Move through the list of tokens, skipping the handle.
00271                                 list<string>::iterator it = tokens.begin ();
00272                                 it ++;
00273                                 
00274                                 int actionIndex = toIndex (actions, (*it++));
00275                                 
00276                                 //If the action is a wild car.
00277                                 if(actionIndex == -1) {
00278                                         actionIndex = 0;
00279                                         wildAction = true;
00280                                 }
00281                                 
00282                                 //If there is no action so far.
00283                                 if(actionObservations [actionIndex] == NULL) {
00284                                         actionObservations [actionIndex] = new SparseMatrix (numStates, numObservations);
00285                                         actionObservations [actionIndex]->clear();
00286                                 }
00287                                 
00288                                 
00289                                 numColons --;
00290                                 
00291                                 //case: T: <action-id>
00292                                 if(0 == numColons) {
00293                                         processData (*(actionObservations [actionIndex]), file);
00294                                 }
00295                                 
00296                                 else {
00297                                         int endStateIndex = toIndex (states, (*it++));
00298                                         
00299                                         
00300                                         numColons --;
00301                                         
00302                                         //case: T: <action-id> : <end-state>
00303                                         if(0 == numColons) {
00304                                                 //Data is on following line.
00305                                                 if(it == tokens.end())
00306                                                         processData (*(actionObservations [actionIndex]), endStateIndex, 
00307                                                                 file);
00308                                                 
00309                                                 //Data is on this line (as we have remaining tokens)
00310                                                 else
00311                                                         processData (*(actionObservations [actionIndex]), endStateIndex, 
00312                                                                 it, tokens.end());
00313                                         }
00314                                         
00315                                         else {
00316                                                 int observationIndex = toIndex (observations, (*it++));
00317                                                 
00318                                                 //T: <action-id> : <end-state> : <observation-id>
00319                                                 //Data is on next line.
00320                                                 if(it == tokens.end()) 
00321                                                         processData (*(actionObservations [actionIndex]), endStateIndex, observationIndex, file);
00322                                                 //Data is on this line.
00323                                                 else 
00324                                                         processData (*(actionObservations [actionIndex]), endStateIndex, observationIndex, *it);
00325                                         }
00326                                 }
00327                                 
00328                                 //We have updated action[0]. If the action is a wild star, then copy
00329                                 //action[0] to all other actions.
00330                                 if(wildAction) {
00331                                         for(int i = 1; i < numActions; i++) {
00332                                                 if(actionObservations [i]) {
00333                                                         delete actionObservations [i];
00334                                                 }
00335                                                 actionObservations [i] = new SparseMatrix( *(actionObservations [0]));
00336                                         }
00337                                 }
00338                         }
00339                         
00340                         //Process a Reward specification.
00341                         if("R" == handle) {
00342                                 
00343                                 //Do we have a wild in action or start state
00344                                 bool wildAction = false;
00345                                 bool wildStartState = false;
00346                                 
00347                                 //iterate over remaining tokesn, ignoring handle.
00348                                 list<string>::iterator it = tokens.begin ();
00349                                 it++;
00350                                 
00351                                 //Retrieve the action index.
00352                                 int actionIndex = toIndex (actions, (*it++));
00353                                 
00354                                 //Is it a wild.
00355                                 if(actionIndex == -1) {
00356                                         wildAction = true;
00357                                         actionIndex = 0;
00358                                 }
00359                                 
00360                                 numColons --;
00361                                 
00362                                 //Retrieve the start state index, again is it a wild.
00363                                 int startState = toIndex (states, (*it++));
00364                                 
00365                                 
00366                                 if(startState == -1) {
00367                                         wildStartState = true;
00368                                         startState = 0;
00369                                 }
00370                                 
00371                                 numColons --;
00372                                 
00373                                 //If there is no entry for this action and start state, then create it.
00374                                 if((rewards [actionIndex]) [startState] == NULL) {
00375                                         rewards [actionIndex] [startState] = new SparseMatrix (numStates, numObservations);
00376                                         rewards [actionIndex] [startState]->clear();
00377                                 }
00378 
00379                                 //R: <action-id> : <start-state>
00380                                 //<matrix>
00381                                 if(numColons == 0) {
00382                                         processData (*(rewards [actionIndex] [startState]), file);
00383                                 }
00384                                 
00385                                 else {
00386                                         int endState = toIndex (states, (*it++));
00387                                 
00388                                         numColons --;
00389                                         //R: <action-id> : <start-state> : <end-state>
00390                                         //<row-vector>
00391                                         if(numColons == 0) {
00392                                                 //Data is on next line.
00393                                                 if(it == tokens.end()) {
00394                                                         processData (*(rewards [actionIndex] [startState]), endState, file);
00395                                                 //Data is on this line.
00396                                                 } else {
00397                                                         processData (*(rewards [actionIndex] [startState]), endState, it, tokens.end());
00398                                                 }
00399                                         }
00400                                         
00401                                         //R: <action-id> : <start-state> : <end-state> : <observation> : %f
00402                                         else {
00403                                                 
00404                                                 int observationIndex = toIndex (observations, (*it++)) ;
00405                                                 //Data is on next line.
00406                                                 if(it == tokens.end()) {
00407                                                         processData (*(rewards [actionIndex] [startState]), endState, observationIndex, file);
00408                                                 //Data is on this line.
00409                                                 } else {
00410                                                         processData (*(rewards [actionIndex] [startState]), endState, observationIndex, *it);
00411                                                 }
00412                                         }
00413                                 }
00414                                 
00415                                 
00416                                 if(wildStartState) {
00417                                         for(int j = 1; j < numStates; j++) {
00418                                                 if(rewards [actionIndex] [0])
00419                                                         rewards [actionIndex] [j] = new SparseMatrix (*(rewards [actionIndex] [0]));
00420                                                 else {
00421                                                         rewards [actionIndex] [j] = new SparseMatrix (numStates,numObservations);
00422                                                         rewards [actionIndex] [j]->clear();
00423                                                 }
00424                                         }
00425                                 }
00426 
00427                                 
00428                                 if(wildAction) {
00429                                         for(int i = 1; i < numActions; i++) {
00430                                                 for(int j = 0; j < numStates; j++) {
00431                                                         if(rewards [0] [j]) {
00432                                                                 rewards [i] [j] = new SparseMatrix ( *(rewards [0] [j]));
00433                                                         } else {
00434                                                                 rewards [i] [j] = new SparseMatrix (numStates, numObservations);
00435                                                                 rewards [i] [j]->clear ();
00436                                                         }
00437                                                 }
00438                                         }
00439                                 }
00440                         }
00441                         
00442                         //Process an action transition probability entry.
00443                         if("T" == handle) {
00444                                 list<string>::iterator it = tokens.begin ();
00445                                 it++;
00446                                 
00447                                 bool wildAction = false;
00448                                 
00449                                 int actionIndex = toIndex (actions, (*it++));
00450                                 
00451                                 if(actionIndex == -1) {
00452                                         wildAction = true;
00453                                         actionIndex = 0;
00454                                 }
00455                                 
00456                                 
00457                                 if(actionTransitions [actionIndex] == NULL) {
00458                                         actionTransitions [actionIndex] =  new SparseMatrix(numStates, numStates);
00459                                         actionTransitions [actionIndex]->clear();
00460                                 }
00461                                 
00462                                 numColons --;
00463                                 
00464                                 if(0 == numColons) {
00465                                         processData (*(actionTransitions [actionIndex]), file);
00466                                 }
00467                                 
00468                                 else {
00469                                         int startState = toIndex (states, (*it++));
00470                                 
00471                                         numColons --;
00472                                 
00473                                         if(0 == numColons) {
00474                                                 if(it == tokens.end()) {
00475                                                         processData (*(actionTransitions [actionIndex]), startState, file);
00476                                                 } else {
00477                                                         processData (*(actionTransitions [actionIndex]), startState, it, tokens.end());
00478                                                 }
00479                                         }
00480                                 
00481                                         else {  
00482                                                 int endState = toIndex (states, (*it++));
00483                                                 
00484                                                 if(it == tokens.end()) {
00485                                                         processData (*(actionTransitions [actionIndex]), startState, endState, file);
00486                                                 } else {
00487                                                         processData (*(actionTransitions [actionIndex]), startState, endState, *it);
00488                                                 }
00489                                         }
00490                                 }
00491                                 
00492                                 if(wildAction) {
00493                                         for(int i = 1; i < numActions; i++) {
00494                                                 if(actionTransitions [i]) {
00495                                                         delete actionTransitions [i];
00496                                                 }
00497                                                 actionTransitions [i] = new SparseMatrix( *(actionTransitions [0]) );
00498                                         }
00499                                 }
00500                         }
00501                 
00502                 }
00503                 
00504                 lineNumber ++;
00505         }
00506         
00507         
00508         //If we have remaining, unspecified matricies - fill them out.
00509         //This could potentially occur in the simulator, with the simulator providing
00510         //entries when they are requested. But that could lead to sporadic timing results,
00511         //this way it will be consistent.
00512         
00513                 for(int i = 0; i < numActions; i++) {
00514                         if(!actionTransitions [i]) {
00515                                 actionTransitions [i] = new SparseMatrix (numStates, numStates);
00516                                 actionTransitions [i]->clear();
00517                         }
00518                         if(!actionObservations [i]) {
00519                                 actionObservations [i] = new SparseMatrix (numStates, numObservations);
00520                                 actionObservations [i]->clear ();
00521                         }
00522                         for(int j = 0; j < numStates; j++) {
00523                                 if(!rewards [i] [j]) {
00524                                         rewards [i] [j] = new SparseMatrix (numStates, numObservations);
00525                                         rewards [i] [j]->clear ();
00526                                 }
00527                         }
00528                 }
00529         
00530         SparseMatrix* ats = new SparseMatrix [numActions];
00531         SparseMatrix* aobs = new SparseMatrix [numActions];
00532         SparseMatrix** rs = new SparseMatrix* [numActions];
00533         
00534         for(int i = 0; i < numActions; i++) {
00535                 ats [i] = *(actionTransitions [i]);
00536                 aobs [i] = *(actionObservations [i]);
00537                 rs [i] = new SparseMatrix [numStates];
00538                 for(int j = 0; j < numStates; j++) {
00539                         rs [i] [j] = *(rewards [i] [j]);
00540                         cout << "reward matrix: " << *(rewards [i] [j]) << endl;
00541                 }
00542         }
00543         
00544         //Return the Simulator.
00545         return new Cassandra (ats, aobs, rs, 
00546                 numActions, numStates, numObservations, discount);
00547 }
